CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7705SARH',"The selected shelf type comes with " & IF(X7705_SAR_H_Module_SUM__c==1,'two',IF(X7705_SAR_H_Module_SUM__c==2,'four','two')) & " E1/T1 RJ 45 ports.","The selected shelf type comes with eight E1/T1 RJ 45 ports.")
CustomField.label: Interfaces
